ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/,IF(OR(RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c,!ISBLANK(RW_Broker__c)),!ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"Channel Partner"),false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Broker Details were filled only on Channel Partner Source
